content: For her service in war, and her innovations in magic, Constance von Nuvelle was among the first to receive peerage from Emperor Edelgard. Though her noble house was given no guarantee of power on a hereditary basis, Constance made certain that House Nuvelle would be valued as a leader in magical research and development for generations to come.

For her service in war, and her innovations in magic, Constance von Nuvelle was among the first to receive peerage in the new Fodlan. For generations thereafter, her noble house was valued as a leader in magical research and development.
